On Mon, Nov 9, 2015 at 7:37 PM, Vijay Vasudevan notifications@github.com
wrote:

hi @jonathanmalkin https://github.com/jonathanmalkin: if you fill in
the path to the .whl file for the platform you are building, it should work.

e.g., if you were installing for OS X, you should do:

pip install --upgrade https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/tensorflow-0.5.0-py2-none-any.whl

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
#59 (comment)
.
